title: I need the Poppy rework.
body: I feel like the Poppy rework has just been swepped under the carpet, and i crie eryteim, i want poppy to be the blood that runs through my veins, but i know shes getting a rework soon, so i dont want to get all crazy learning old poppy until shes reworked, rito pls. anyone know whats happening atm with her? havent heard anything since they announced it basically.{{champion:78}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:78}}

replies.body: Why are you interested in playing Poppy if you don't even know how her playstyle will be like?
Don't worry man, its coming soon, i estimate before the end of October.

Poppy is the only one on the "rework" list now after MF and GP come out next patch.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884

Soon TM
